org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.runtimesupport

Class OptExceptionTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jikesrvm.compilers.common.ExceptionTable
      • org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.runtimesupport.OptExceptionTable

  • final class OptExceptionTable
extends ExceptionTable
    Encoding of try ranges in the final machinecode and the corresponding exception type and catch block start.

    • Field Detail

      • UNREACHABLE_CATCH_BLOCK

        private static final int UNREACHABLE_CATCH_BLOCK
        Marker for catch blocks that have no associated code. This happens when the optimizing compiler deems the catch block to be unreachable and removes it from the IR.

        The only constraint on the concrete value for this marker is that it must be negative to ensure that the non-existent catch block is never found when exceptions are delivered.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Returns:
